website_summaries.verdict: The Narrative Clip is a gadget that clips onto your clothing and automatically takes candid 5-megapixel photos to log your life. But we expect much more, including better image quality, for its steep $229 asking price.
pros: Automatically takes 5-megapixel photos every 30 seconds to log your life
Small and lightweight enough to forget it's there
cons: Expensive for what it is and what you get
Picture quality may not be good enough for some

customer_reviews.title: Small but takes great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. it took a few times of using it to figure out the best place to wear it and get the best pictures. I have used it around the house, at parties and while hiking through the Arizona Painted Desert/Petrified Forest. The pictures are remarkably clear and the camera is so light that you forget you are wearing it. It's easy to turn off, I just put it in my pocket or turn it face down on a flat surface. The uploading to the Narrative website is painless and you can edit the pictures before posting them to a shared folder. I love it and am looking forward to taking it on vacation this summer.
customer_reviews.author: JiffyJoe

customer_reviews.title: Not a gadget for me.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good gadget to chronicle my trip to Prague. It simply did not do the trick for me. Photos were blurry, and it rarely captured anything. I thought it was supposed to be a photo every 30 seconds. It took one like every 5 minutes. I also attempted to double tap many times and ended up with nothing. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: KJuice

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, poor quality pictures. I love the idea of this and even though I'm not horribly happy with the picture quality, we continue to use it for fun. The indoor pictures are very grainy; outdoor high sunlight photos are better, but still not even cell phone quality. The iPhone app leaves a lot to be desired, it's hard to flip through pictures slowly. You can download to your own computer, but the orientation is not fixed before export so going through thousands of photos that are rotated all differently is not very fun.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as I have been debating on buying this for months. I wish I would have bought it sooner. I took this to Hawaii this past month and I was amazed at the quality of the pictures. Yes you will get some shots you don't want but who cares. You will get some great pictures that you will have missed. I am truly glad that I took the chance on this device.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: I love my Narrative Clip I and wear it every day
customer_reviews.text: I love my Narrative Clip I and wear it every day! I'm going to purchase the Narrative Clip 2 soon unless you all want to give me one, as I post by my pictures everyday of my office antics, where I placed my camera
customer_reviews.author: alphas1

customer_reviews.title: save your money.  do not bother
customer_reviews.text: Talk about wasting money .... I kept trying to use this camera on a few trips .... in Sept fully charged it took about 10 minutes worth of boring pics .... fast forward to my last outing ... where I wore it all day long ...... I lost the entire day. Yeah I bought it to long ago to return so it's off to the oven to be melted into nothingness. .. save your money people
customer_reviews.author: T F

customer_reviews.title: Wait for the Narrative 2. I have tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wait for the Narrative 2. I have tried to wear the Narrative on shirt, hat, and every place else and it always seems to be a bit off for photos. Have a lot of content but no real keepers. Can't tell what photos you have until you connect it to a computer with a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Charliemontana

customer_reviews.title: Memories were lost by bad software!
customer_reviews.text: While the customer care agent contacting me and was nice about the issue I had, I feel that there is a blaring issue that is not addressed in the manuals or written anywhere else: you CANNOT use more than one per email address, it NEEDS to be registered, and once you register a new device with the same email, the device is WIPED (memories and all). We used 2 devices and came home to nothing after a wedding because the devices were WIPED by the software. The software only stated that the it was registering a new device and provided ZERO warning that doing so would also ERASE everything.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: This arived in expected time and is easy to use once set up
customer_reviews.text: This arived in expected time and is easy to use once set up. My husband is trying to get used to positioning so that photos are more centered, such as architecture and fireworks. Fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: its great..
customer_reviews.text: When it functions correctly, its great... but if you have a problem while out/away from your computer, its basically impossible to troubleshoot. On the plus side, their customer service is amazing... but I wish I hadnt had to use that service in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea - works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Awesome idea - works pretty well. The web / mobile needs a lot more features to help manage large photo sets this includes: 1. Ability to filter photos by (Double tap, User selected Favrouites, and Auto Favourites). 2. Ability to easily and quickly delete photos with a swipe like tinder type system. 3. Easy functionality to share photos, sets of photos to an external photo storage solution such as dropbox, amazon drive, google photos, flickr etc.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gene A. Conroy-jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for bloggers!
customer_reviews.text: Good product.......wait for the next model though it will have more better features.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: makes a fun slide show and captures some great
customer_reviews.text: Takes pics every 30 seconds, makes a fun slide show and captures some great moments
customer_reviews.author: CCogs

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have the latest iteration of this product.
customer_reviews.text: it didn't work because version 1.0, of which this was, is no longer supported.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tirebiter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outdoor image captures
customer_reviews.text: I used the narrative to clip to capture moments with my family all over Japan and came back with many deeply satisfyingly memories that I couldn't have preserved any other way.
customer_reviews.author: JacustJack

customer_reviews.title: you have to go to their website and download the ...
customer_reviews.text: you have to go to their website and download the "uploader". After that and a charge it worked the first time I used it. The photos are decent quality and very interesting to see. The photo is one of the random
customer_reviews.author: carpet guy

customer_reviews.title: OK but!
customer_reviews.text: Tough to get pointed where you want. 1st load of pictures disappeared. Kind of tough learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed with how limited the capabilities of this camera is. Used it only once.
customer_reviews.author: Zensational

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product, photo quality depends on good light so not so good in night clubs, got a lot of attention from my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It's a fitness app 👼🏻
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Used it all the time. Problems with it is that people know it's a camera. I'll tell them no it's a fitness device that's connected to my iPhone. I like it because I can wear it all day then edit out the bad pictures.
customer_reviews.author: F. tayo

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to look at pics on my computer and could ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to look at pics on my computer and could not find a way to do it. Must use phone app even though instruction imply you can see pics from computer. Sent email to tech support and got no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Denisw

customer_reviews.title: Not Suitable for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Not suitable for travel, need 'good' internet connection, otherwise hours to upload. Maybe completed 1 upload in 9 days of travel. Also need a computer that you'll have to worry about. Can upload to your computer without internet but 99.5% of pics unusable or need time consuming editing. The double tap cannot be depended upon, not sure if it even works. Plowing through thousands of pics is not something most people have time for.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs the option to download as a simple flash component instead of running everything through the Narrative Software
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but I haven't had it long enough to test all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Narrative Clip, Wearable camera, mini camera
customer_reviews.text: When you upload photos wirelessly, It is regrettable and to become the product fantastic I There is a feeling shorter than I thought also battery time but, It is a good product as expected
customer_reviews.author: Jeonjaeseop

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two Narrative Clips and experienced several problems, including: - The camera does not work reliably. Sometimes it takes pictures, sometimes it does not. The intervals between pictures are not always 30 seconds. - There is no feedback to tell if the camera is on or off and if the battery is charged while somebody is wearing the camera. We used this camera for research, paid participants to wear it, and sadly it was a waste of money as none of the pictures got recorded. The good thing is that the design of the camera is discrete and the design of the software is pretty intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: S. V.

customer_reviews.title: It took pictures at all kinds of bad angles, picture quality was not good
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back. It took pictures at all kinds of bad angles, picture quality was not good. You spend hours of time just looking for one good picture. Then you have to pay a monthly fee if you want to use the software. Don't recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i wish i can have my money back
customer_reviews.text: pros: 1-wearable cons : 1- can't wear it and stop taking pictures . 2-it took 1000 pictures of the inside of my bag!!! 3-must upload pictures to lap top or you can't even purview them . 4-needs a subscription later on from certain options. 5- i don't know if the cam is on or off or out of battery ? 6-i threw it somewhere in the house i can't remember where exactly.
customer_reviews.author: GHAWTH

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and its dead. Wont charge or turn on.. today is Thanksgiving. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: bachilds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't just "work" like it says - at least not mine
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't just "work" like it says - at least not mine. Charged, put on and walked around and it doesn't take continual pictures and when I "tap" it for one on demand - sometime it works and most time not. I have to tap it numerous times. Might be me, however I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Zanoff

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a useless device that I will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with someone else's information on it. Was sold as new but when I received the camera and went to set it up there was a previous owners info registered to it. Amazon did not reply back but Narrative did and said that these cameras can only be registered with one user. Now I have a useless device that I will be returning. After viewing Narrative's Facebook Page, it looks like I am not the only one this has happened to.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Miller

customer_reviews.title: In theory good - in actuality bad
customer_reviews.text: If you can get the softwear to work and the camera to work and the tap feature to work - you are doing way better than me! Should have know not to buy as the minute I did the company is sending me offers for Narrative clip 2. Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I had to click on something to get this review to come up. My real review is 0 stars. It didn't work. I had to return it. When plugged in, everything looked ok and the indicators showed that pictures were downloading but I didn't get any pictures except for about 10 when I put it on a table for awhile. For 4-5 days I wore it on my shirt and didn't get any results.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

product_meta.title: Narrative Clip Wearable Camera (Gray)
product_meta.description:
Color:Gray

The Narrative Clip allows you to stay in the moment while still capturing it. Just clip it on and it starts taking pictures. Double tap to take an extra shot - put it in your pocket to turn it off. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


The Wearable Camera For Moments That Matter Two days of battery life and built in storage for up to 6000 photos allows you to capture the candid moments of your next trip, outdoor event, favourite hobby or precious moments with the family. 

Experience a new kind of photography Free cloud storage and apps that automatically organize and highlight your best shots allows you to stay in the now while the Clip takes care of the rest.


Travel  Going on vacation or just a quick city break? Just clip it on and never miss a moment. 


A memorable event Get a unique perspective of a memorable event with photos that last a lifetime. 


Outdoor activities Put the Clip on your helmet while you cycle or on your backpack while hiking. Whatever your hobby is we ensure that you capture the moments that matter. 



Share to your followers Share your favorite moments to social media or to your Narraitve followers. Get inspired by others and inspire with your own best shots. Narrative Clip comes with its own social experience.

About the Startup 
Describe your product in 3 words.

Capture, relive, share

Where did you get the inspiration for your product?

There are so many special moments in our lives that we never come around to capture, or simply don't want to disturb by bringing up a camera. For me, the inspiration for the Narrative Clip came from all the small moments in life that I didn't capture and later wished I had.

What differentiates your product from similar products out there?

The Narrative Clip is unique in its simplicity, small and lightweight design and the holistic approach towards an app enabled camera where your photos are always available.

Tell us about the best and most challenging parts of the creation process.

Taking something all the way all the way from idea to manufacturing and distribution is a very complex process - and we've been focused on not taking any shortcuts during the way to be able to provide a product that really lives up to its promise.
feature_bullets: Capture, store and relive special moments with the world's most wearable camera
Just Clip it on - Double tap to capture a special moment or put it face down to make it sleep
Automatically takes two photos every minute - a memory for 6000 photos and a battery that lasts 30 hours
Capture the moment as it happens, without interference. Complement your staged photos of majestic scenery with the intensity of the small moments that matter the most
